title: Download Files from Zenodo Deposits
text: simple R package download files Zenodo.

title: Download Files from Zenodo Deposits
text: can install development version zendown GitHub :

title: Download Files from Zenodo Deposits
text: First, need find Zenodo deposition code. number appears end Zenodo deposition link. code number also appears Zenodo DOI version. Deposition code: 10950327 deposition code, get list files available deposition can download files. single file specifying name.
code: https://zenodo.org/records/10950327 library(zendown)  res <- file_list(deposit_id = 10950327) res #> # A tibble: 9 × 5 #>   id                                   filename   filesize checksum links        #>   <chr>                                <chr>         <dbl> <chr>    <list>       #> 1 354f3f9c-68c1-4371-bd85-54a619e0bf37 indi_0002…     4312 ae0e78c… <named list> #> 2 2009399c-e516-41dc-a93e-95221e4c5a87 indi_0002…    10125 7d102ad… <named list> #> 3 43250883-cce6-45d0-995e-89b9f5095dca indi_0002…    25198 fc84fef… <named list> #> 4 1b5b9285-d320-481c-963e-497ae92fcd07 indi_0002…  1041878 cfbe847… <named list> #> 5 86670252-1b0e-42ef-b490-622040b2f95f indi_0002…  2229008 7fb9d70… <named list> #> 6 8703e1fb-58fb-4cd6-aa31-7080177f1e0e indi_0002…    79814 1c960f8… <named list> #> 7 2509c72c-5a0c-4dc8-862d-a759e7d5729f indi_0002…    23929 8752b55… <named list> #> 8 ed4bdcaa-7cb0-444f-a44f-1e6caf86f53f indi_0002…   292771 a388cb0… <named list> #> 9 baecc25f-d7c0-42c1-b3d0-397f2ec1eb6d indi_0002…   218872 fe15a4f… <named list> zendown(file_list = res, dest = tempdir()) zendown(file_list = res, file_name = "indi_0002_regsaude_res_year.parquet", dest = tempdir())

title: Download files from a Zenodo deposition list of files — zendown
text: file_list data.frame tibble. Obtained file_list. file_name character. NULL, files file list. file name specified, file downloaded. dest character. Destination folder. quiet logical. Show download info progress bar.
